data.title: Shirin Ebadi
data.meta_description: Shirin Ebadi is an Iranian Nobel laureate, lawyer, writer, teacher and a former judge and founder of the Defenders of Human Rights Center in Iran. In 2003, Ebadi was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize for her pioneering efforts for democracy and women's, children's, and refugee rights. She was the first Muslim woman and the first Iranian to receive the award.
data.text:
Persian-Londoner lawyer, human rights activist (born 1947) / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
